name: Gini-Apps LTD
description:
Gini-Apps was founded in 2010  By Tamir Avrahamov and Shay Somech. Gini-Apps is a mobile development company with expertise in iOS, Android, server side and Unity games development. At Gini Apps, we come to work every morning with one goal in mind: to create the best mobile apps with passion. Our clients’ success is our success, and so we never compromise: our product managers, designers, developers, and testers are the best in their field, and we are all here for the long ride.
Millions of people use our apps every day. We work with clients from diverse fields – from the top news sites in the country to major health-care providers abroad. From design, through development and testing, to product launch and beyond, Gini Apps is a one-stop shop for people, brands, and corporations who strive for perfection.
